attributes.action: Please add our names to Amber Rudd's list of 'foreign workers'.
attributes.additional_details:
Please sign this petition if you are a British citizen who thinks this policy is a cheap and shameful stunt. 

For more info, see:

http://www.independent.co.uk/news/uk/politics/immigration-foreign-workers-business-leaders-tory-crackdown-amber-rudd-a7345271.html
attributes.background: Amber Rudd wants a list of "foreign workers" so businesses can be "named and shamed”. We, the undersigned, are British citizens who would like our names added to this list. We stand in solidarity with foreign workers, who help build homes, look after the sick and serve in our armed forces.
